sqlMap.select: SELECT MLP.MBR_LEV_NM , MLP.MBR_LEV_CD , ISNULL((DBO.FN_MBR_NEXT_LEV_NM(#MBR_ID#)), (SELECT MBR_LEV_NM FROM ASW_M_MBR_LEV_PLICY WHERE MBR_LEV_CD = MLP.MBR_LEV_CD)) AS NEXT_LEV_NM ,MLP.MBR_LEV_AMOT ,(dbo.FN_MBR_NEXT_LEV_AMOT(#MBR_ID#)) AS NEXT_MBR_LEV_AMOT ,(dbo.FN_MBR_PROD_PT_OUT_SCORE(#MBR_ID#)) as PROD_PT_OUT_SCORE ,(dbo.FN_MBR_COPN_COUNT(#MBR_ID#)) as COPN_COUNT ,(dbo.FN_MBR_RESV_FUND(#MBR_ID#)) as RESV_FUND , MM.MBR_ID , MM.MBR_NM , MM.MBR_EMAIL , MM.MBR_PHONE , MM.MBR_MOBILE FROM ASW_M_MBR_LEV_PLICY MLP LEFT OUTER JOIN ASW_M_MBR MM ON MM.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# WHERE MLP.MBR_LEV_CD = (SELECT MML.MBR_LEV_CD FROM M_MBR_LEV MML WHERE MML.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# AND MML.MBR_LEV_DT = (SELECT MAX(S_MML.MBR_LEV_DT) FROM ASW_M_MBR_LEV ASW_S_MML WHERE ASW_S_MML.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# ) )

SELECT ISNULL(SUM(ODT.DEPOSIT_AMOUNT),0) AS MBR_AMT FROM O_ORDER OOR INNER JOIN O_DEPOSIT ODT ON ODT.ORDER_NO = OOR.ORDER_NO INNER JOIN O_ORDER_SEND OOS ON OOS.ORDER_NO = OOR.ORDER_NO WHERE 1=1 AND OOR.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# AND OOR.CLAIM_YN = 'N' AND OOS.ORDER_PACKING_DT IS NOT NULL AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), OOS.ORDER_PACKING_DT, 112) >= CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), DATEADD(YEAR,-1, GETDATE()),112)+'01' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), OOS.ORDER_PACKING_DT, 112) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, -1, CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), DATEADD(MONTH,0, GETDATE()),112)+'01'), 112)

SELECT TOP 3 NUM, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_STATE, BOARD_MST_CD, BOARD_MST_NM, BOARD_PROD_YN FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.BOARD_SEQ desc ) AS NUM , A.BOARD_SEQ AS BOARD_SEQ , A.BOARD_TITLE AS BOARD_TITLE , (CASE WHEN C.BOARD_REPLY IS NOT NULL THEN '완료' ELSE '대기' END) AS BOARD_STATE , A.BOARD_MST_CD , T.BOARD_MST_NM AS BOARD_MST_NM , T.BOARD_PROD_YN FROM ASW_BOARD_BASE A LEFT OUTER JOIN ASW_BOARD_TP_REPLY C ON C.BOARD_SEQ = A.BOARD_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN ASW_BOARD_MST T ON T.BOARD_MST_CD = A.BOARD_MST_CD WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS_YN = 'Y' AND T.BOARD_TP_CD = 'BBT00002' AND A.REG_ID = #MBR_ID# ) k

SELECT TOP 1 NUM, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, REG_ID, REG_DT, BOARD_STATE, PROD_GRADE, PROD_NM, PROD_CD, BASIC_IMG FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.BOARD_SEQ desc ) AS NUM , A.BOARD_SEQ , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.REG_ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), A.REG_DT, 120) AS REG_DT , (CASE WHEN C.BOARD_REPLY IS NOT NULL THEN '완료' ELSE '대기' END) AS BOARD_STATE , C.PROD_GRADE , (SELECT PROD_NM FROM P_PROD Y WHERE Y.PROD_CD = X.PROD_CD) AS PROD_NM , X.PROD_CD AS PROD_CD , (SELECT G.ATTCH_FILE_PATH FROM ASW_G_ATTCH G WHERE G.ATTCH_CD = I.ATTCH_CD) AS BASIC_IMG FROM ASW_BOARD_BASE A INNER JOIN ASW_BOARD_TP_PROD X ON X.BOARD_SEQ = A.BOARD_SEQ INNER JOIN P_PROD_BASIC_IMG I ON I.PROD_CD = X.PROD_CD AND I.PROD_BASIC_SIZE_BMS = 'M' LEFT OUTER JOIN ASW_BOARD_TP_REVIEW C ON C.BOARD_SEQ = A.BOARD_SEQ WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS_YN = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_MST_CD = 'BBM00005' AND A.REG_ID = #MBR_ID# ) k

SELECT (SELECT count(OOR.ORDER_NO) FROM O_ORDER OOR WHERE OOR.CLAIM_YN = 'N' AND OOR.ORDER_DT BETWEEN DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()) and GETDATE() AND OOR.ORDER_STATUS_CD = 'OOS00001' AND OOR.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# ) AS ORDER_CNT , (SELECT count(OOR.ORDER_NO) FROM O_ORDER OOR WHERE OOR.CLAIM_YN = 'N' AND OOR.ORDER_DT BETWEEN DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()) and GETDATE() AND OOR.ORDER_STATUS_CD in ('OOS00002','OOS00003') AND OOR.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# ) AS DEPOSIT_CNT , (SELECT count(OOR.ORDER_NO) FROM O_ORDER OOR WHERE OOR.CLAIM_YN = 'N' AND OOR.ORDER_DT BETWEEN DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()) and GETDATE() AND OOR.ORDER_STATUS_CD in ('OOS00004','OOS00009') AND OOR.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# ) AS SEND_CNT , (SELECT count(OOR.ORDER_NO) FROM O_ORDER OOR WHERE OOR.CLAIM_YN = 'Y' AND OOR.ORDER_DT BETWEEN DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()) and GETDATE() AND OOR.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# ) AS CLAIM_CNT

SELECT OIHV.*, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(day, 5, OIHV.ORDER_DT), 120) AS ORDER_PAY_DT FROM ORDER_INFO_HIS_VIEW OIHV
OIHV.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID#
OIHV.ORDER_DT >= CONVERT(datetime, #S_DATE#)
OIHV.ORDER_DT < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #E_DATE#)
OIHV.ORDER_NO = #ORDER_NO#
OIHV.ORDER_DT between DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()) and GETDATE()
ORDER BY OIHV.ORDER_DT_FULL DESC
SELECT OPILV.* FROM ORDER_PROD_INFO_LIST_VIEW OPILV WHERE OPILV.ORDER_NO = #orderNo#
SELECT OPILV.* FROM CLAIM_PROD_INFO_LIST_VIEW OPILV WHERE OPILV.ORDER_NO = #orderNo#

SELECT OW.MBR_ID , OW.PROD_CD , OW.REG_DT , PP.PROD_NM , (SELECT G.ATTCH_FILE_PATH FROM ASW_G_ATTCH G WHERE G.ATTCH_CD = PBI.ATTCH_CD) AS BASIC_IMG , (SELECT PAIM.PROD_ADD_INFO_VAL FROM P_PROD_ADD_INFO_MPG PAIM WHERE PAIM.PROD_ADD_INFO_CD = 'PAI00004' AND PAIM.PROD_CD = OW.PROD_CD ) as PPT_CD , STUFF((SELECT ','+PSP.SEC_PROD_NM FROM P_SEC_PROD_MPG SPM INNER JOIN P_SEC_PROD PSP ON SPM.SEC_PROD_CD = PSP.SEC_PROD_CD WHERE OW.PROD_CD = SPM.PROD_CD FOR XML PATH('')),1 ,1,'') AS SEC_PROD_NM , REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(PPF.PROD_PRICE as MONEY), 1), '.00', '') AS PROD_PRICE , REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(PPF.PROD_SALE_PRICE as MONEY), 1), '.00', '') AS PROD_SALE_PRICE , REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(PPF.PROD_PT_IN_SCORE as MONEY), 1), '.00', '') +'P' AS PROD_PT_IN_SCORE
, dbo.FN_INVENTORY_QTY(PP.PROD_CD) AS ORDER_QTY FROM O_WISHLIST OW INNER JOIN P_PROD PP ON PP.PROD_CD = OW.PROD_CD AND PROD_USE_FLAG_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN (SELECT PPF.* FROM P_PROD_FI PPF WHERE PPF.PROD_INFO_REG_NO = (SELECT MAX(S_PPF.PROD_INFO_REG_NO) FROM P_PROD_FI ASW_S_PPF WHERE PPF.PROD_CD = ASW_S_PPF.PROD_CD ) ) PPF ON OW.PROD_CD = PPF.PROD_CD INNER JOIN P_PROD_BASIC_IMG PBI ON PBI.PROD_CD = OW.PROD_CD AND PBI.PROD_BASIC_SIZE_BMS = 'M' WHERE MBR_ID = #MBR_ID#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY MPTL.MBR_PT_ACC_DT desc ) AS NUM , MPTL.* FROM (SELECT A.MBR_ID AS MBR_ID , X.MBR_NM AS MBR_NM , REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST((A.MBR_PT_SCORE) AS MONEY), 1), '.00', '')+'P' AS MBR_PT_SCORE , '적립' AS A_STATE , A.MBR_PT_ACC_DT AS MBR_PT_ACC_DT , (SELECT Y.PT_NM FROM ASW_M_MBR_PT_PLC Y WHERE Y.PT_CD = A.PT_CD) AS PT_NM FROM ASW_M_MBR_PT_LIST A INNER JOIN ASW_M_MBR X ON A.MBR_ID = X.MBR_ID UNION ALL SELECT OD.MBR_ID AS MBR_ID , (SELECT M.MBR_NM FROM ASW_M_MBR M WHERE OD.MBR_ID = M.MBR_ID) AS MBR_NM , REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST((P.PROD_PT_OUT_SCORE * O.PROD_QTY) AS MONEY), 1), '.00', '')+'P' AS MBR_PT_SCORE , '차감' AS A_STATE , OD.ORDER_DT AS MBR_PT_ACC_DT , (SELECT RO.PROD_NM+' 구매' AS PROD_NM FROM P_PROD RO WHERE RO.PROD_CD = P.PROD_CD) AS PT_NM FROM P_PROD_PT P INNER JOIN O_ORDER_PROD O ON P.PROD_CD = O.PROD_CD AND P.PROD_INFO_REG_NO = O.PROD_INFO_REG_NO INNER JOIN O_ORDER OD ON O.ORDER_NO = OD.ORDER_NO ) MPTL WHERE MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# AND MBR_PT_SCORE <> '0P' ) x WHERE NUM BETWEEN #START_PAGE_NUM# AND #END_PAGE_NUM# ORDER BY MBR_PT_ACC_DT DESC

SELECT (count(A.MBR_PT_SEQ)+(SELECT count(P.PROD_INFO_REG_NO) from P_PROD_PT P INNER JOIN O_ORDER_PROD D ON P.PROD_CD = D.PROD_CD AND P.PROD_INFO_REG_NO = D.PROD_INFO_REG_NO INNER JOIN P_PROD_PT PPT ON PPT.PROD_CD = D.PROD_CD INNER JOIN O_ORDER OD ON D.ORDER_NO = OD.ORDER_NO AND OD.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# )) AS totCnt FROM ASW_M_MBR_PT_LIST A WHERE A.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID#

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT ECN.COPN_CD AS COPN_CD , ECN.COPN_NM AS COPN_NM , ( CASE WHEN ECN.COPN_TP_PDMC = 'P' THEN '상품' WHEN ECN.COPN_TP_PDMC = 'D' THEN '다운로드' WHEN ECN.COPN_TP_PDMC = 'M' THEN '회원' WHEN ECN.COPN_TP_PDMC = 'C' THEN 'CS전용' ELSE '' END ) AS COPN_TP_PDMC_NM , ( CASE WHEN ECN.COPN_DIS_TP_RAP = 'R' THEN '비율' WHEN ECN.COPN_DIS_TP_RAP = 'A' THEN '금액' WHEN ECN.COPN_DIS_TP_RAP = 'P' THEN '상품증정' ELSE '' END ) AS COPN_DIS_TP_RAP_NM , ( CASE WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'A' THEN '무제한' WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'P' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ECN.COPN_USE_START_DT, 120) + ' ~ ' + CASE WHEN MCL.COPN_END_DT IS NOT NULL THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), MCL.COPN_END_DT, 120) WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'A' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 120) WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'P' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ECN.COPN_USE_END_DT, 120) WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'M' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(Month, ISNULL(ECN.COPN_VALIDITY, 0), MCL.COPN_ISU_DT), 120) WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'D' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(Day, ISNULL(ECN.COPN_VALIDITY, 0), MCL.COPN_ISU_DT), 120) ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(Day, ISNULL(ECN.COPN_AFTER_DAY, 0), MCL.COPN_ISU_DT), 120) END WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'M' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(Month, ISNULL(ECN.COPN_VALIDITY, 0), MCL.COPN_ISU_DT), 120)+' 까지' WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'D' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(Day, ISNULL(ECN.COPN_VALIDITY, 0), MCL.COPN_ISU_DT), 120)+' 까지' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(Day, ISNULL(ECN.COPN_AFTER_DAY, 0), MCL.COPN_ISU_DT), 120)+' 까지' END ) AS COPN_DT , ( CASE WHEN OCU.ORDER_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '사용' WHEN OCU.ORDER_NO is null THEN '미사용' END ) AS COPN_STATE , CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ECN.COPN_USE_START_DT, 120) AS COPN_USE_START_DT , CASE WHEN MCL.COPN_END_DT IS NOT NULL THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), MCL.COPN_END_DT, 120) WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'A' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 120) WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'P' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ECN.COPN_USE_END_DT, 120) WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'M' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(Month, ISNULL(ECN.COPN_VALIDITY, 0), MCL.COPN_ISU_DT), 120) WHEN ECN.COPN_LIMIT_TP_APMD = 'D' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(Day, ISNULL(ECN.COPN_VALIDITY, 0), MCL.COPN_ISU_DT), 120) ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(Day, ISNULL(ECN.COPN_AFTER_DAY, 0), MCL.COPN_ISU_DT), 120) END as COPN_USE_END_DT, MCL.COPN_ISU_DT, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),OOR.ORDER_DT,102) as ORDER_DT FROM ASW_M_MBR_COPN_LIST MCL LEFT JOIN E_COPN ECN ON MCL.COPN_CD = ECN.COPN_CD LEFT JOIN O_COUPON_USE OCU ON MCL.COPN_ISU_CD = OCU.COPN_ISU_CD LEFT JOIN O_ORDER OOR ON OOR.ORDER_NO = OCU.ORDER_NO WHERE MCL.MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# ) a ORDER BY CASE WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),COPN_USE_END_DT,112) > CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),112) THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, CASE WHEN a.COPN_STATE = '미사용'THEN 1 WHEN a.COPN_STATE = '사용' THEN 2 END , a.COPN_ISU_DT DESC

SELECT top 1 TRANS_NM , TRANS_REV_NM , MBR_ADDR , MBR_ADDR_DTL , MBR_ZIPCODE , MBR_PHONE , MBR_MOBILE , TRANS_INFO_SEQ FROM ASW_M_TRANS_INFO WHERE MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# AND BASIC_TRANS_YN = 'Y' order by MBR_REG_DT DESC

SELECT TRANS_INFO_SEQ , BASIC_TRANS_YN , TRANS_NM , TRANS_REV_NM , MBR_ADDR , MBR_ADDR_DTL , MBR_ZIPCODE , MBR_PHONE , MBR_MOBILE FROM ASW_M_TRANS_INFO WHERE MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# ORDER BY TRANS_INFO_SEQ DESC

SELECT TRANS_INFO_SEQ , BASIC_TRANS_YN , TRANS_NM , TRANS_REV_NM , MBR_ADDR , MBR_ADDR_DTL , MBR_ZIPCODE , MBR_PHONE , MBR_MOBILE FROM ASW_M_TRANS_INFO WHERE MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# AND TRANS_INFO_SEQ = #TRANS_INFO_SEQ#

SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(AA.TOTALAMT) IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE SUM(AA.TOTALAMT) END AS TOTAL_AMT FROM ( SELECT (OAH.ORDER_AMT - OAH.ORDER_SALE_AMT + OAH.ORDER_DELI_CHARGE - OAH.ORDER_COPN_AMT - OAH.ORDER_RESV_AMT - OAH.ORDER_PT_OUT_SCORE) AS TOTALAMT , OD.ORDER_STATUS_CD , OD.ORDER_DT FROM O_ORDER_AMT_HIS OAH LEFT JOIN O_ORDER OD ON OAH.ORDER_NO = OD.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN O_ORDER_SEND S ON S.ORDER_NO = OD.ORDER_NO WHERE OD.CLAIM_YN = 'N' AND S.ORDER_PACKING_DT IS NOT NULL AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), OD.ORDER_DT, 120) = #YEAR# AND OD.MBR_ID= #MBR_ID# ) AA

SELECT MLP.MBR_LEV_NM , MLP.MBR_LEV_CD ,(dbo.FN_MBR_PROD_PT_OUT_SCORE(#mbrId#)) as PROD_PT_OUT_SCORE ,(dbo.FN_MBR_COPN_COUNT(#mbrId#)) as COPN_COUNT FROM ASW_M_MBR_LEV_PLICY MLP WHERE MLP.MBR_LEV_CD = (SELECT MML.MBR_LEV_CD FROM ASW_M_MBR_LEV MML WHERE MML.MBR_ID = #mbrId# AND MML.MBR_LEV_DT = (SELECT MAX(S_MML.MBR_LEV_DT) FROM ASW_M_MBR_LEV ASW_S_MML WHERE ASW_S_MML.MBR_ID = #mbrId# ) )
SELECT REGI_NO FROM O_ORDER_SEND WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ORDER_NO = #ORDER_NO#
